snippet.title: Trailer for Doki Doki Storm
snippet.description:
The trailer for my NEWLY RELEASED mod for Doki Doki Literature Club!  :D  (Content warning for self-harm and blood)


This will be the story from Yuri's point of view...  her struggles with fitting in, her flights of fantasy, her self-harm habit, and her eventual dark, twisted descent into madness.  It's gonna be quite a ride.  :)


I started working on this project two and a half years ago, and the full version is finally done!  :D  Check it out:


https://redd.it/it6vmx





My Discord server:  https://discord.gg/f7HDrNY


This is a fan-made work based on Doki Doki Literature Club, the visual novel game by Team Salvato. I am not affiliated with Team Salvato. Their game can be downloaded from https://ddlc.moe/
